summary: This memorandum details the recruitment of Emilio Americo RODRIGUEZ by the Habana Station at a rate of $300.00 per month, effective 1 June 1960. It requests that Finance Division deposit the monthly salary into a specific bank account under the name of Emilio Rodrigues, with the first deposit to be made on 30 June 1960. No taxes are to be withheld from the salary.
title: Emilio Americo RODRIGUEZ
